data.eml:eml: Two new genera of small, six-eyed pholcid spiders from West Africa, and first record of Spermophorides for mainland Africa (Araneae: Pholcidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huber, Bernhard A. (2007): Two new genera of small, six-eyed pholcid spiders from West Africa, and first record of Spermophorides for mainland Africa (Araneae: Pholcidae). Zootaxa 1635: 23-43, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179534
